Class BaseMod

java.lang.Object
  BaseMod
Direct Known Subclasses:
mod_Animations, mod_Armor, mod_Arrows, mod_BuffGUI, mod_Floodgate, mod_LightSensor, mod_MipMap, mod_Panorama, mod_RecipeBook, mod_Shelf, mod_SpawnerGUI, mod_Stackables
public abstract class BaseMod
extends java.lang.Object

Inherit this class in new mods for it to be used by ModLoader.

Version:
Beta 1.8.1

                              double x,

Dispenses the entity associated with the selected item.

Parameters:

x - X coordinate.
y - Y coordinate.
z - Z coordinate.
xVel - X velocity.
zVel - Z velocity.
item - ID of item to chosen to dispense entity.
Returns:
true if item was handled.
